articles.title: U.S. Breaks Covid-19 Record Again With Over 110,000 New Cases on Thursday
articles.description: The U.S. has broken its own record for daily cases of covid-19, with 116,225 new cases on Thursday, according to the Covid Tracking Project, up from the previous record of 103,087 new cases on Wednesday.
